statements.select: SELECT e.*, d.C_DESCDSTRO , p.C_DESCPROV, de.C_DESCDPTO FROM entidad e inner join ubigeo_dstro d on e.c_id_dpto = d.c_id_dpto and e.c_id_prov = d.c_id_prov and e.c_id_dstro = d.c_id_dstro inner join ubigeo_prov p on e.c_id_dpto = p.c_id_dpto and e.C_ID_PROV = p.C_ID_PROV inner join UBIGEO_DPTO de on e.c_id_dpto = de.c_id_dpto where e.n_estado = 1

SELECT e.*, d.C_DESCDSTRO , p.C_DESCPROV, de.C_DESCDPTO FROM entidad e inner join ubigeo_dstro d on e.c_id_dpto = d.c_id_dpto and e.c_id_prov = d.c_id_prov and e.c_id_dstro = d.c_id_dstro inner join ubigeo_prov p on e.c_id_dpto = p.c_id_dpto and e.C_ID_PROV = p.C_ID_PROV inner join UBIGEO_DPTO de on e.c_id_dpto = de.c_id_dpto where N_COD_ENTIDAD = #IdTipo#
statements.update: UPDATE entidad SET C_DES_RAZON = #DesTipo#, C_COD_RUC = #CodRuc#, c_direccion = #Direccion# WHERE N_COD_ENTIDAD = #IdTipo#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO ENTIDAD ( C_DES_RAZON, C_COD_RUC, c_direccion, n_estado, c_usuario_creacion, D_FEC_REGISTRO, c_id_dstro, c_id_prov, c_id_dpto) VALUES (#DesTipo#, #CodRuc#, #Direccion#, #Estado#, #UsuarioCreacion#, #FecRegistro#, #IdDstro#, #IdProv#, #IdDpto# )
